languages.text: "Сколь бы прекрасен ни был свет звезды, ей суждено угаснуть. Твой брат мон-кай не был светом, ибо тьма клубилась в его сердце. И потому незачем скорбеть о пустом".

traits.locale_text: "Сколь бы прекрасен ни был свет звезды, ей суждено угаснуть. Твой брат мон-кай не был светом, ибо тьма клубилась в его сердце. И потому незачем скорбеть о пустом".
traits.speaker: Quetza_EldarGuardianDefender_Leader

languages.text: "No matter how fair the starlight, the star is destined to fade some day. Your fellow mon-keigh was not of the light, for there was darkness clouding his heart. You need not grieve his loss."
languages.original_text: "Сколь бы прекрасен ни был свет звезды, ей суждено угаснуть. Твой брат мон-кай не был светом, ибо тьма клубилась в его сердце. И потому незачем скорбеть о пустом".

traits.locale_text: "No matter how fair the starlight, the star is destined to fade some day. Your fellow mon-keigh was not of the light, for there was darkness clouding his heart. You need not grief in vain."
traits.speaker: Quetza_EldarGuardianDefender_Leader

traits.locale_text: "No matter how fair the starlight, the star is destined to fade some day. Your fellow mon-keigh was not of the light, for there was darkness clouding his heart. You need not grief in vain."
traits.speaker: Quetza_EldarGuardianDefender_Leader

traits.locale_text: "No matter how fair the starlight, the star is destined to fade some day. Your fellow mon-keigh was not of the light, for there was darkness clouding his heart. You need not grief in vain."
traits.speaker: Quetza_EldarGuardianDefender_Leader

traits.locale_text: "No matter how fair the starlight, the star is destined to fade some day. Your fellow mon-keigh was not of the light, for there was darkness clouding his heart. You need not grieve his loss."
traits.speaker: Quetza_EldarGuardianDefender_Leader

traits.locale_text: "No matter how fair the starlight, the star is destined to fade some day. Your fellow mon-keigh was not of the light, for there was darkness clouding his heart. You need not grieve his loss."
traits.speaker: Quetza_EldarGuardianDefender_Leader

languages.text: «No importa cuán radiante sea la luz de una estrella, su destino es disiparse algún día. Tu amigo mon-keigh no era un ser de luz, pues las tinieblas nublaban su corazón. No tienes por qué lamentar su muerte».
languages.original_text: "No matter how fair the starlight, the star is destined to fade some day. Your fellow mon-keigh was not of the light, for there was darkness clouding his heart. You need not grieve his loss."

traits.locale_text: «No importa cuán radiante sea la luz de una estrella, su destino es disiparse algún día. Tu amigo mon-keigh no era un ser de luz, pues las tinieblas nublaban su corazón. No lamentes su muerte en vano».
traits.speaker: Quetza_EldarGuardianDefender_Leader

languages.text: “无论星光多么美丽，星星注定会有暗淡的一天。你的同伴身上没有任何光明，黑暗已经笼罩了他的心灵。你不必徒劳地为他悲伤。”
languages.original_text: "No matter how fair the starlight, the star is destined to fade some day. Your fellow mon-keigh was not of the light, for there was darkness clouding his heart. You need not grieve his loss."

traits.locale_text: “无论星光多么美丽，星星注定会有暗淡的一天。你的同伴身上没有任何光明，黑暗已经笼罩了他的心灵。你不必徒劳地为他悲伤。”
traits.speaker: Quetza_EldarGuardianDefender_Leader

languages.text: « Quelle que soit la beauté de sa lumière, une étoile est destinée à s'éteindre un jour. Votre semblable n'avait rien de lumineux, car les ténèbres habitaient son cœur. Vous n'avez pas à regretter sa mort. »
languages.original_text: "No matter how fair the starlight, the star is destined to fade some day. Your fellow mon-keigh was not of the light, for there was darkness clouding his heart. You need not grieve his loss."

traits.locale_text: « Quelle que soit la beauté de sa lumière, une étoile est destinée à s'éteindre un jour. Votre semblable n'avait rien de lumineux, car les ténèbres habitaient son cœur. Vous n'avez pas à regretter sa mort. »
traits.speaker: Quetza_EldarGuardianDefender_Leader

languages.text: 「どんなに美しい星の光も、いつかは消えゆく運命にある。お前の仲間のモン＝ケイは光にあらず、その心を闇が覆っていた。彼の死を悲しむ必要はない」
languages.original_text: "No matter how fair the starlight, the star is destined to fade some day. Your fellow mon-keigh was not of the light, for there was darkness clouding his heart. You need not grieve his loss."

traits.locale_text: 「どんなに美しい星の光も、いつかは消えゆく運命にある。お前の仲間のモン＝ケイは光にあらず、その心を闇が覆っていた。彼の死を悲しむ必要はない」
traits.speaker: Quetza_EldarGuardianDefender_Leader

languages.text: "So hell das Sternenlicht auch scheinen mag, der Stern ist dazu verdammt, eines Tages zu verblassen. Euer Chem-Pan-Sey-Bruder kam nicht vom Licht, denn Dunkelheit trübte sein Herz. Ihr müsst seinen Verlust nicht betrauern."
languages.original_text: "No matter how fair the starlight, the star is destined to fade some day. Your fellow mon-keigh was not of the light, for there was darkness clouding his heart. You need not grieve his loss."

traits.locale_text: "So hell das Sternenlicht auch scheinen mag, der Stern ist dazu verdammt, eines Tages zu verblassen. Euer Chem-Pan-Sey-Bruder kam nicht vom Licht, denn Dunkelheit trübte sein Herz. Ihr müsst nicht umsonst trauern."
traits.speaker: Quetza_EldarGuardianDefender_Leader

languages.text: "Her ne kadar yıldız ışığı göz alıcı olsa da o yıldız, bir gün solmaya mahkûmdur. Mon-keigh dostunun yüreğine karanlık çökmüştü, ondandır ki ışıltısı yoktu. Onu kaybettiğin için yas tutmamalısın."
languages.original_text: "No matter how fair the starlight, the star is destined to fade some day. Your fellow mon-keigh was not of the light, for there was darkness clouding his heart. You need not grieve his loss."

traits.locale_text: "Her ne kadar yıldız ışığı göz alıcı olsa da o yıldız, bir gün solmaya mahkûmdur. Mon-keigh dostunun yüreğine karanlık çökmüştü, ondandır ki ışıltısı yoktu. Onu kaybettiğin için yas tutmamalısın."
traits.speaker: Quetza_EldarGuardianDefender_Leader
